block.exp1182.spawn_boss.desc: [创造专用]这里按时刷新世界BOSS
block.exp1182.spawn_bullet.desc: 发射强击退子弹，用以考察盾牌成就
exp1182.advancements.root.title: 魔城传说 II - 火山
exp1182.advancements.root.description: 一切说明，尽在成就描述里。
exp1182.advancements.feather.title: 庇护之羽
exp1182.advancements.feather.description: Immune to fall damage in Majou area.
exp1182.advancements.shoes.title: Lifting Shoes
exp1182.advancements.food.title: Enchanted Food
exp1182.advancements.food.description: Destroy breakable blocks by right clicking them on the SIDE.
exp1182.advancements.shield_bronze.title: Bronze Shield
exp1182.advancements.shield_bronze.descr: Deflect some specific bullets in Majou area.
exp1182.advancements.great_key.title: Great Key
exp1182.advancements.great_key.descripti: Allows you to enter some doors.
exp1182.advancements.holy_water.title: Holy Water
exp1182.advancements.holy_water.descript: Allows you to enter the flame portal.
exp1182.advancements.candle.title: Blessed Candle
exp1182.advancements.candle.description: Immune to the blindess effect by the Darkness area
exp1182.advancements.balloon.title: Ballon Bomb
exp1182.advancements.balloon.description: Destroy breakable blocks by right clicking them on the BOTTOM.
exp1182.advancements.triangle.title: Musical Triangle
exp1182.advancements.triangle.descriptio: Now music plays in the Majou area for you.
exp1182.advancements.breakable.title: Break a block
exp1182.msg.req_balloon: You need Balloon Bomb to destroy it from under.
exp1182.msg.req_food: You need magical meal to destroy it from side.
exp1182.msg.req_mine: You need landmine to destroy it from above.[Impossible until next mod]
exp1182.msg.ego.req.ego_door_closer: Come closer to use the door.
item.exp1182.spawn_worldboss.desc: Spawn a World Boss, use sparingly!
item.exp1182.tp_go.desc: Right click to accept teleport, sneak+right click to switch subscription.
item.exp1182.fire_memento.tooltip:
魔城起处，熔岩墙壁，
火种隐藏其隙。
寻得圣水一穿过，
却道是，英豪天地。
几多艰险，深湖巧计，
考验皆成过去。
恶魔岔路尽通关，
能力锁，又回原地。
item.exp1182.fire_memento.clue:
魔城起处，熔岩墙壁，
火种隐藏其隙。
寻得圣水一穿过，
却道是，英豪天地……
